summary: This module implements a collection of Checkov rules that examine Terraform definitions for DigitalOcean resources, flagging insecure SSH key configurations on Droplets, unrestricted inbound firewall rules, public read permissions on Spaces buckets, and the absence of bucket versioning.
business_intent: Assist DevSecOps and cloud engineering teams in automatically detecting and correcting insecure DigitalOcean infrastructure settings within IaC pipelines, thereby improving security posture and compliance.
